channel.title: Xin Xiong on Conchy's house
channel.description: Recent content in Xin Xiong on Conchy's house

item.title: About me
item.description: Introduction Link to heading Hi! This is Xin Xiong, a neophyte of OS (security) research, currently studying in secsys lab at Fudan University. I’ve been doing some researchs about bug detection in OS kernels with static analysis and fuzzing since 2020. And I’ve submitted some modest patches to Linux kernel, most of which accepted by developers. I’m quite intrigued by the magic of OS itself, which drives me crazy and yen to explore more in depth.
